author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: please belay for a few days, we're [considering an API change](https://github.com/gwater/NumberIntervals.jl/issues/16) which should probably happen before the first release
Thank you for your patience, this is ready to move forward.

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/gwater/NumberIntervals.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
